bibl.title: The Place of Residence of the Divorced Wife in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: I. The wife's ownership of the house. - II. Brother and sister marriages: P. Ryl. II, 111 (AD 159/60); - P. Flor. III, 301 (AD 173/4); - P. Berl. Leihg. I, 17 (AD 159/60).
BARKER Donald C., The Place of Residence of the Divorced Wife in Roman Egypt.
Akten des 21. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses = ArchPF. Beiheft 3. I (Stuttgart - Leipzig, 1997) pp. 59-66, 4 tabl.
145.4 P. Berl. Leihgabe I, 17 P. Flor. III, 301 P. Ryl. II, 111
